data.title: Musicianify
data.subtitle: A Chrome Extension that Helps You to be a Killer Musician
data.description: Provides an HTML5 video looper manager and a drum machine for repeated and intensive musical exercises.

data.title: Banco De Portugal Telemarketing Analyzer
data.subtitle: A Full-Stack Machine learning Suite for Querying, Processing, and Training Models
data.description: A full-stack data analysis application to predict future responses of respondents for the bank's telemarketing by using React, Material UI, Python, Flask, Pandas, and Scikit.

data.title: Auto Insurance Claim Prediction
data.subtitle: A Research Project for Fair Premium Pricing
data.description: A custom data analysis framework to predict the future claim amount based on customerâ€™s attributes and past behaviors by using R, Python, Tensorflow, Pandas, Scikit, and XGBoost.

data.title: BambooShoot
data.subtitle: A Career Management Solution for Professionals
data.description: A Web-app that helps professionals and students to organize vocational activities for career management.

data.title: AIAbalone
data.subtitle: An Abalone Game Playing Agent
data.description: Implemented a traditional board game Abalone in Python and Pygame with an artificial intelligence game playing agent using Minimax Alpha-Beta Pruning as a search method.

data.title: Bitcoin Casino
data.subtitle: An Android App for Crypto-currency Newbies
data.description: Provide a real-world based simulation on crypto-currency investment and related information (charts & news) for those who want to learn about it without risks.

data.title: Safebox for Students
data.subtitle: Omnipresent Protection Blackbox
data.description: Suggests a preventive solution for abuse, violence, and any illegal activities in schools. This device also has a study planner to help students for preparation of school works.

data.title: Parallel Selves
data.subtitle: Experiences in the Multiverse
data.description: Presents an artistic incarnation of relative time and space to provide indirect experiences of lives in the Multiverse.

data.title: The Cosmic Flow
data.subtitle: The Moment of Creation
data.description: Introduces an interactive artwork that shows the holistic dynamics deeply embedded in the universe by integrate the generative visual elements with the view's motion.

data.title: The Cube
data.subtitle: A Surrounding-included Virtual Reality Box
data.description: Introduces a futuristic platform that allows audiences to have augmented spatial experiences of virtual identities.

data.title: Universe of Entities
data.subtitle: Informational Entirety
data.description: Aims to build a theoretical substructure of the computational creativity by establishing the fundamental principles on the ecology of the totalistic symbol system.

data.title: Money is Beautiful
data.subtitle: See Different
data.description: Presents a micro-level of viewpoint for U.S. currencies to scrutinize implied symbolism of economic hegemony.

data.title: Face Information Marketing Strategy
data.subtitle: Transformation of Physiological Information
data.description: Describes a futuristic marketing strategy that utilizes a 3-dimensional camera to read a person's economic behaviors based on physiologic information and semiologic analysis.

data.title: Virtual Reality Room
data.subtitle: An Alternative Way for VR
data.description: Suggests an alternative way to enjoy a VR experience without being alienated with surroundings.

data.title: Foodtainment
data.subtitle: A Research Project on the Essence of Amusement
data.description: Investigates the essential principle hidden under the way we feel amusement from diverse daily activities.

data.title: AI Design Machine
data.subtitle: A High-Level Scheme for Generative Design
data.description: Suggests a high-level scheme that contains necessary data and procedures to develop an AI design agent.

data.title: Pamphlet of Korea University
data.subtitle: Prints Design
data.description: Proposes several prints design for various purposes in visual communication.

data.title: Green Umbrella
data.subtitle: An Umbrella without Wastes
data.description: Suggests a practical design for an umbrella that doesn't need to put a plastic cover to prevent a wet floor when inside of the building.

data.title: Sympathy of Space
data.subtitle: Urban Design for the International District
data.description: Develops a zoning plan and an architectural landscape design for the International District in Seoul city. It suggests a holistic land-management solution for mixed-cultural areas.

data.title: Golf 2.0
data.subtitle: A Golf Course with Narratives
data.description: Constructs a narrative golf course for a golf simulator Golfzone (http://www.golfzon.com). Each hole is made to represent a card from the Tarot cards major arcana for continuous user experiences.

data.title: Apple Tree Band Concert 2011
data.subtitle: At Abbey Road (Seoul)
data.description: Plays some rock, blues, and pop.

data.title: Humane Golf Fitting
data.subtitle: Golf Club as a Human-Ball Interface
data.description: Improves golf clubs by applying not only the technical/scientific principles but also operational usability for an imperfect user.

data.title: Urban Traffic Square
data.subtitle: A Realistic Plan for Green City
data.description: Converts the intersections to parks to minimize accidents, provide green space, improve traffic flow, and encourage various activities.

data.title: Landtainment
data.subtitle: An Augmented Reality Game Plan for Local Economy
data.description: Launches an adventure role-playing game by using the AR technologies with the assets of the community (traditional markets, historic sites, local attractions) to promote the local economy.

data.title: Roof Garden of Korea University
data.subtitle: A Shelter for the Weak
data.description: Incorporates a user-specific imaginary environment into the design for a roof garden of Dong-won global leadership center with Feng Shui principles.

data.title: Booklet of Korea University
data.subtitle: Design As Vehicle for Secret Code
data.description: Conveys multi-layered meanings through various symbolic elements with gestalt principles.

data.title: Siting Guidelines of Green Space with GIS
data.subtitle: GIS Geo-value Analysis
data.description: Discovers the most effective location for green space in a city for a urban development plan by using the Geographic Information System technology.

data.title: The Symbol
data.subtitle: Infinite Destination
data.description: A graphical representation on what the ultimate path leads to.
